title: website: tip.golang.org/s fails
body:
http://tip.golang.org/s/go14import says
vfs_tip: in revStat("224fd9c75cea6c1760433ed9af4ce7ddb8c7f37c",
"s/go14import"), failed to get parent "s": vfs_tip: error statting
"224fd9c75cea6c1760433ed9af4ce7ddb8c7f37c" / "s": file does not exist

it would be nice if tip.golang.org could have /s links working right, because the docs
(like release notes) refer to /s.
or maybe the docs should be updated to say //golang.org/s ?
